casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Shaikh Muhammad ABDULLAH. No. 490P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of November 2008 by Defendant for Surcharge Taxes Reimbursed:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
